function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate readiness for pandemic and post-pandemic realities in GBCSs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Integration of pandemic readiness criteria into green building certification standards","Technologies":"Smart building systems, air purification technologies","People":"Building owners, occupants, public health authorities","Owner":"Green building certification organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to address environmental resources and comfort categories","Impact":"Decreased focus on sustainability, occupant well-being, and resource efficiency","Mitigation":"Incorporation of environmental resource and comfort criteria into certification standards","Technologies":"Energy-efficient systems, sustainable materials, indoor air quality monitoring","People":"Building designers, developers, occupants","Owner":"Green building certification organizations"}]}
